Question: After Oxford, this person attended Yale Law School and earned a Juris Doctor (J.D.) degree in 1973.
Hints: Schools have been named for this person, and statues do homage him.
This person came out for gay marriage in July 2009 and urged the Supreme Court to overturn DOMA in 2013.
This person did eventually move to Texas with Rodham to take a job leading George McGovern's effort there in 1972.
